CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1962, pg. 18 reads: "Glamorous Junior Mothers will be among the charming hostesses at Loendi Club's Monte Carlo Nights, May 24, 25 and 26. Shown here: Alma Fox, Jean Pendleton, Betty Tibbs, Lois Watson and Evelyn Anderson.  These dolls will be on hand to show you how to play various games and to greet you in name of Loendi. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five women, left to right: Alma Speed Fox, Betty Tibbs, standing in rear, Jean McClanahan Pendleton and Lois Weaver Watson seated, and Evelyn Anderson, gathered in Loendi Club to host Monte Carlo Nights
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Loendi Club (Pittsburgh, Pa.).Fox, Alma Speed.Tibbs, Betty.Anderson, Evelyn.Pendleton, Jean [McClanahan].Watson, Lois Weaver.
